nodes.label: require ! (ctx . accounts . from . amount >= amount , ErrorCode :: InsufficientFunds) ;

let cpi = CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , Transfer { from : ctx . accounts . from . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . to . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . user . to_account_info () , } ,) ;
emit ! (TokensSent { from : ctx . accounts . user . key () , to : ctx . accounts . to . key () , amount }) ;

let cpi = CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , Burn { mint : ctx . accounts . mint . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . from . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . user . to_account_info () , } ,) ;
emit ! (TokensBurned { burner : ctx . accounts . user . key () , amount }) ;
